---
category: news
title: "Mumbai: Railway cops to have a facial recognition app to identify criminals"
excerpt: "The Government Railway Police (GRP) is on the verge of developing an in house software to identify criminal with the previous criminal records. The software would have a facial recognition system which will enable the police to go through previous criminal history of a person with just a click."
